articles.title: Having sex in space is not an easy feat, say scientists - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Getting pregnant in space and maintaining pregnancy have been found to be quite difficult in space in animal experiments and no human has been tested so far.
articles.content: However, the difficulty in containing bodily fluids during the act will be difficult to overcome. Videos onboard the ISS have given us sufficient information to know that bodily fluids would also coa… [+1140 chars]
